CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1962, pg. 21 reads: "The fourth, fifth, and sixth grades of the Robert L. Vann School are to present on Friday at 7:30 P.M. in auditorium, an opereatta [sic] entitled "Four Feathers West." Pictures from the scenes are shown in the photos...Queen And Pirate - Lloyd Hartwell as Bunkum, the Pirate, pleads with eh Queen to com away with him."
TitMainTitle: Lloyd Hartwell, wearing pirate costume, kneeling in front of two girls, including "Queen" Cassandra Berry wearing crown, gathered on stage for performance of "Four Feathers West," Vann Elementary school
